params.data: Additional data to pass to the proxy constructor or any other data useful during deployement.
params.implementation: Address of the implementation to point to.
params.salt: Salt to use for the deterministic address generation.

deployProxyByImplementation(address,byte.notice: Deploys a proxy that points to that points to the given implementation.
